title: The Ashen World
excerpt: An eerie, cursed village of Bettiah. Ashish discovers his family's dark history while battling internal fears and external forces.

title: A Glimmer of the End
excerpt: Post-apocalyptic story of Ashish and his family facing unimaginable hardships, survival, and human fragility.

title: Love & Perseverance
excerpt: Exploring human emotions, fear of loss, and hope through personal relationships and growth.
